education.nameSchool: Instituto Federal do Sertão de Pernambuco
education.description: Ingressei na area em 2020 por meio do curso técnico, e logo comecei a trabalhar na área desenvolvendo projetos para colegas de curso e estudantes do ensino superior dando inicio ao meu networking.

Busquei de forma independente aprimorar meus conhecimentos em plataformas como: Danki Code, Udemy, Curso em Vídeo, noneclass, clarausjogos, entre outras. Durante meus estudos, me concentrei na aplicação prática, desenvolvendo projetos que solidificaram minha compreensão e habilidades.
Transferido, continuei minha jornada acadêmica em busca de conhecimentos, experiência e networking, participando de .

experience.description: Working on real-world projects to apply and enhance technical skills. Contributed to the development and implementation of solutions, gaining hands-on experience in problem-solving.
Conducting in-depth analyses of specific cases to understand and solve complex problems. Documented findings and conclusions, demonstrating analytical and research skills.
Engaging in freelance projects, providing services to clients and working independently. Developed custom solutions, met client requirements, and delivered high-quality results.
Contributing to open-source projects, collaborating with a global community of developers. Submitted pull requests, addressed issues, and improved the functionality of open-source software.
Participating in integrative projects that involve combining different technologies or disciplines. Collaborated with diverse teams to create comprehensive solutions to complex challenges.
Completing online courses to stay updated on the latest technologies. Acquired new skills and knowledge in areas such as web development, programming languages, and software engineering.
Actively seeking new opportunities and experiences to expand skills and knowledge. Eager to explore diverse projects and contribute to innovative initiatives.

skills.details: Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets & Sassy Cascading Style Sheets

services.description: Create beautiful and interactive user interfaces for websites and web applications.
Build the server-side logic and databases that power web applications.
Combine front-end and back-end skills to develop complete web solutions.
Create user-friendly and visually appealing web interfaces for a great user experience.
Optimize and improve existing codebases for better performance and maintainability.
Contribute to open-source projects and collaborate with the developer community.
Design and manage databases for efficient data storage and retrieval.
Create APIs to enable communication and data exchange between different software systems.
Ensure the quality and reliability of software through testing and quality assurance processes.
Produce technical documentation, manuals, and articles to support software projects.
Offer technical consulting and training services to individuals and businesses.
Develop code and software solutions for school projects and activities.

projects.description: One of my first projects, made using more basic skills trying to imitate something I saw in a post and also asking a certain person to date.
